    All of my publications (in ADS)

    Refereed Publications:

    • Yoon, D., Yuan, F., Ostriker, J.P., & Ciotti, L. “On the Role of Hot Feedback Mode in Active Galactic Nuclei Feedback in an Elliptical Galaxy” 2018, Submitted to ApJ
      arXiv

    • Yoon, D., Yuan, F., Gan, Z., Ostriker, J.P., Li, Y., & Ciotti, L. “Active Galactic Nuclei Feedback in an Elliptical Galaxy with the Most Updated AGN Physics (II): High-Angular Momentum Case” 2018, ApJ, 864, 6
      ApJ | arXiv

    • Li, Y., Yuan, F., Mo, H., Yoon, D., Gan, Z., Ho, L.C., Wang, B., Ostriker, J.P., & Ciotti, L. “Stellar and AGN feedback in isolated early-type galaxies: the role in regulating star formation and ISM properties” 2018, ApJ, 866, 70
      ApJ | arXiv

    • Yuan, F., Yoon, D., Li, Y., Gan, Z., Ho, L.C., & Guo, F. “Active Galactic Nuclei Feedback in an Elliptical Galaxy with the Most Updated AGN Physics (I): Low-angular Momentum Case” 2018, ApJ, 857, 121
      ApJ | arXiv

    • Morsony, B., Gracey, B., Workman, J., & Yoon, D. “G2 and Sgr A *: A Cosmic Fizzle at the Galactic Center” 2017, ApJ, 843, 29
      ApJ | arXiv

    • Yoon, D. & Heinz, S. “Bow-shock Pulsar Wind Nebulae Passing Through Density Discontinuities” 2017, MNRAS, 464, 3297
      MNRAS | arXiv

    • Yoon, D., Zdziarski, A., & Heinz, S. “Formation of recollimation shocks in jets of high-mass X-ray binaries” 2016, MNRAS, 456, 3638
      MNRAS | arXiv

    • Yoon, D. & Heinz, S. “Global Simulations of the Interaction of Microquasar Jets with a Stellar Wind in High-mass X-ray Binaries” 2015, ApJ, 801, 55
      ApJ | arXiv

    • Kim, W.-T., Seo, W.-Y., Stone, J. M., Yoon, D. & Teuben, P. J. “Central Regions of Barred Galaxies: Two-dimensional Non-self-gravitating Hydrodynamic Simulations” 2012, ApJ, 747, 60
      ApJ | arXiv

    • Yoon, D., Morsony, B., Heinz, S., Wiersema, K., Fender, R.P., Russell, D.M., & Sunyaev, R. “Jet Trails and Mach Cones: the Interaction of Microquasars With the Interstellar Medium” 2011, ApJ, 742, 25
      ApJ | arXiv
